EmailTemplate.name: Client Due for Followup 3 Months
EmailTemplate.subject: CIMI Client Followup Visit Due Soon
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Client__c.00NV00000016Qtg}, Our records indicate that your client, ****-**- {!TRIM(RIGHT(Client__c.Name, 5))}, is due for a followup CIMI visit within the next 10 days. According to your site's protocol, a Client should have a Followup Visit every 3 months after the Baseline Visit, or until treatment is completed. If you have already scheduled a follow-up visit with this Client, please disregard this message. If the client has concluded treatment, please make sure that their record is closed by indicating “End of Treatment” in the follow-up visit record.
